short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help scrape reviews of Amazon products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will scrape reviews for any Amazon product of your choice by simply copying the URL and pressing submit. Use reviews to organize and research what people are saying about your product or what people are saying about your competitors product in one place. You also have the ability to research existing products and see how they can be improved. This tool makes it very easy for you to do that.
